newsitem.title: UK: London gold closes firmer, above key $350 level.
newsitem.headline: London gold closes firmer, above key $350 level.

text.p: GOLD - Finishes firmer at $350.20/$350.70, from $348.30/$348.80 on Thursday. Spent day hovering around psychological $350 level, seeking direction.
SILVER - Closes nine cents lower at $5.03/$5.05. But bounces off lows after probing key $5.00 support level.
PLATINUM - Ends down but off lows at $369.00/$370.00, off $2.70.
PALLADIUM - Closes barely changed at $146.75/$147.75, up $0.25.
